001
002package com.commercetools.history.defaultconfig;
003
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.function.Supplier;
006
007import javax.annotation.Nullable;
008
009import com.commercetools.history.client.ApiRoot;
010import com.commercetools.history.client.ByProjectKeyRequestBuilder;
011import com.commercetools.history.client.HistoryCorrelationIdProvider;
012
013import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
014import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http.CorrelationIdProvider;
015import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http.Middleware;
016import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2.ClientCredentials;
017
018public class HistoryApiFactory {
019
020    public static ByProjectKeyRequestBuilder createForProject(final String projectKey,
021            final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint, final String apiEndpoint) {
022        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of()
023                .defaultClient(apiEndpoint, credentials, tokenEndpoint)
024                .addCorrelationIdProvider(new HistoryCorrelationIdProvider(projectKey))
025                .buildForProject(projectKey);
026    }
027
028    public static ByProjectKeyRequestBuilder createForProject(final String projectKey,
029            final Supplier<ApiHttpClient> clientSupplier) {
030        return create(clientSupplier).withProjectKeyValue(projectKey);
031    }
032
033    public static ApiRoot create(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
034            final String apiEndpoint) {
035        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of().defaultClient(apiEndpoint, credentials, tokenEndpoint).build();
036    }
037
038    public static ApiRoot create(final VrapHttpClient httpClient, final ClientCredentials credentials,
039            final String tokenEndpoint, final String apiEndpoint) {
040        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of(httpClient).defaultClient(apiEndpoint, credentials, tokenEndpoint).build();
041    }
042
043    public static ApiRoot create(final VrapHttpClient httpClient, final ClientCredentials credentials,
044            final String tokenEndpoint, final String apiEndpoint, final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
045        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of(httpClient)
046                .defaultClient(apiEndpoint, credentials, tokenEndpoint)
047                .addMiddlewares(middlewares)
048                .build();
049    }
050
051    public static ApiRoot create(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
052            final String apiEndpoint, final CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
053        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of()
054                .defaultClient(apiEndpoint, credentials, tokenEndpoint)
055                .addCorrelationIdProvider(correlationIdProvider)
056                .build();
057    }
058
059    public static ApiRoot create(final VrapHttpClient httpClient, final ClientCredentials credentials,
060            final String tokenEndpoint, final String apiEndpoint, final CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
061        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of(httpClient)
062                .defaultClient(apiEndpoint, credentials, tokenEndpoint)
063                .addCorrelationIdProvider(correlationIdProvider)
064                .build();
065    }
066
067    public static ApiRoot create(final VrapHttpClient httpClient, final ClientCredentials credentials,
068            final String tokenEndpoint, final String apiEndpoint, final List<Middleware> middlewares,
069            final CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
070        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of(httpClient)
071                .defaultClient(apiEndpoint, credentials, tokenEndpoint)
072                .addCorrelationIdProvider(correlationIdProvider)
073                .addMiddlewares(middlewares)
074                .build();
075    }
076
077    public static ApiRoot create(final Supplier<ApiHttpClient> clientSupplier) {
078        return ApiRoot.fromClient(clientSupplier.get());
079    }
080
081    public static ApiRoot create(final ClientCredentials credentials) {
082        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of().defaultClient(credentials).build();
083    }
084
085    public static ApiRoot create(final ClientCredentials credentials, ServiceRegionConfig serviceRegion) {
086        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of().defaultClient(credentials, serviceRegion).build();
087    }
088
089    public static ApiHttpClient defaultClient(final ClientCredentials credentials) {
090        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of().defaultClient(credentials).buildClient();
091    }
092
093    public static ApiHttpClient defaultClient(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
094            final String apiEndpoint) {
095        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of().defaultClient(apiEndpoint, credentials, tokenEndpoint).buildClient();
096    }
097
098    public static ApiHttpClient defaultClient(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
099            final String apiEndpoint, final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
100        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of()
101                .defaultClient(apiEndpoint, credentials, tokenEndpoint)
102                .addMiddlewares(middlewares)
103                .buildClient();
104    }
105
106    public static ApiHttpClient defaultClient(final VrapHttpClient httpClient, final ClientCredentials credentials,
107            final String tokenEndpoint, final String apiEndpoint) {
108        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of(httpClient)
109                .defaultClient(apiEndpoint, credentials, tokenEndpoint)
110                .buildClient();
111    }
112
113    public static ApiHttpClient defaultClient(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
114            final String apiEndpoint, final CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
115        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of()
116                .defaultClient(apiEndpoint, credentials, tokenEndpoint)
117                .addCorrelationIdProvider(correlationIdProvider)
118                .buildClient();
119    }
120
121    public static ApiHttpClient defaultClient(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
122            final String apiEndpoint, final List<Middleware> middlewares,
123            final CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
124        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of()
125                .defaultClient(apiEndpoint, credentials, tokenEndpoint)
126                .addCorrelationIdProvider(correlationIdProvider)
127                .addMiddlewares(middlewares)
128                .buildClient();
129    }
130
131    public static ApiHttpClient defaultClient(final VrapHttpClient httpClient, final ClientCredentials credentials,
132            final String tokenEndpoint, final String apiEndpoint, final CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
133        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of(httpClient)
134                .defaultClient(apiEndpoint, credentials, tokenEndpoint)
135                .addCorrelationIdProvider(correlationIdProvider)
136                .buildClient();
137    }
138
139    public static ApiHttpClient defaultClient(final VrapHttpClient httpClient, final ClientCredentials credentials,
140            final String tokenEndpoint, final String apiEndpoint, final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
141        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of(httpClient)
142                .defaultClient(apiEndpoint, credentials, tokenEndpoint)
143                .addMiddlewares(middlewares)
144                .buildClient();
145    }
146
147    public static ApiHttpClient defaultClient(final VrapHttpClient httpClient, final ClientCredentials credentials,
148            final String tokenEndpoint, final String apiEndpoint, final List<Middleware> middlewares,
149            @Nullable final CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
150        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of(httpClient)
151                .defaultClient(apiEndpoint, credentials, tokenEndpoint)
152                .addCorrelationIdProvider(correlationIdProvider)
153                .addMiddlewares(middlewares)
154                .buildClient();
155    }
156
157    public static ApiHttpClient defaultClient(final VrapHttpClient httpClient, final ClientCredentials credentials,
158            final String tokenEndpoint, final String apiEndpoint, final Supplier<String> userAgentSupplier,
159            final List<Middleware> middlewares, @Nullable final CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
160        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of(httpClient)
161                .defaultClient(apiEndpoint, credentials, tokenEndpoint)
162                .addCorrelationIdProvider(correlationIdProvider)
163                .withUserAgentSupplier(userAgentSupplier)
164                .addMiddlewares(middlewares)
165                .buildClient();
166    }
167
168    public static ApiHttpClient defaultClient(final Supplier<VrapHttpClient> httpClientSupplier,
169            final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint, final String apiEndpoint,
170            final List<Middleware> middlewares, @Nullable final CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
171        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of(httpClientSupplier.get())
172                .defaultClient(apiEndpoint, credentials, tokenEndpoint)
173                .addCorrelationIdProvider(correlationIdProvider)
174                .addMiddlewares(middlewares)
175                .buildClient();
176    }
177
178    public static ApiHttpClient defaultClient(final Supplier<VrapHttpClient> httpClientSupplier,
179            final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint, final String apiEndpoint,
180            final Supplier<String> userAgentSupplier, final List<Middleware> middlewares,
181            @Nullable final CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
182        return HistoryApiRootBuilder.of(httpClientSupplier.get())
183                .defaultClient(apiEndpoint, credentials, tokenEndpoint)
184                .addCorrelationIdProvider(correlationIdProvider)
185                .withUserAgentSupplier(userAgentSupplier)
186                .addMiddlewares(middlewares)
187                .buildClient();
188    }
189}
